plot: Lisa develops a crush on Nelson, and tries to reform him; Homer gets an autodialer and decides to make easy money with a telemarketing scam.

Lisa develops a crush on Nelson, due to his rebellious attitude, she tries to reform him and make him act like a gentleman, but she notices that Nelson hasn't changed his ways after she discovers that he and his friends were responsible for throwing rancid coleslaw at Skinner's house. Meanwhile, Homer finds an electronic dialer and he uses it to create a telemarketer scam in order to get more money from his friends and neighbors. Homer is soon busted by Chief Wiggum for his scam and he is forced to apologize to everyone for his illegal panhandling.—dawsonpersi
